title: Welcome to Wakandell: "I Backflip in Response"
itunes:title: Welcome to Wakandell: "I Backflip in Response"
description:
Today we are discovering the wonderful world of Wakandell. Jasper is our Dungeon Master as this episode takes us through a very mini one-shot! WAKANDELL FOREVER! 


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
